translation.en: Small boat adrift!
Starboard bow.
Look, look starboard.
Up into the wind. Get out the small boat.
translation.es: Contra el viento. Saquen el bote.

translation.en: Pull away!
Easy.
Get that jimmy.
Pull it out.
Is anyone aboard?
-I can't tell. Why don't you get-- -Get that painter.
Pull that line, Kearney.
Come on, get that boat in.
Watch the sides.
There's two of them, sir. A man and a woman.
translation.es: Son dos, señor. Un hombre y una mujer.

translation.en: -Dead or alive? -Dead, sir.
Pull the crossline.
-A child, sir. -A what?
Alive.
I'll take him.
Thank you, ma'am.
There, now.
"We therefore commit their bodies to the bosom of the waters
translation.es: "Entregamos sus cuerpos a las entrañas del océano...

translation.en: to be turned into corruption looking for the resurrection of the body
translation.es: ...para la corrupción de la carne en espera de la resurrección...

translation.en: when the sea shall give up her dead and the life of the world to come...
translation.es: ...cuando el mar entregue sus muertos y la vida del mundo por venir...

translation.en: Through Our Lord, Jesus Christ.
Amen."
Captain.
The surgeon would like to have a word with you, sir.
The sickness in the crew, sir.
You've got five more taken down since midwatch.
translation.es: Cinco más enfermaron desde la guardia de media.

translation.en: Fever. Canker sores.
Your cabinet is full of bromide. Now, leech it out.
translation.es: Su botiquín está lleno de bromuro. Sánelos.

translation.en: It's beyond bleeding, sir.
Mr. Penfield...
I look to your medical knowledge.
Three days after we left Moorea, you thought it was scurvy.
translation.es: A los tres días que partimos de Morea, pensó que era escorbuto.

translation.en: Half the crew took sick. You told me it was breakbone fever.
translation.es: La mitad de la tripulación enfermó. Dijo que era dengue. Los síntomas eran confusos. Ahora lo sé.

translation.en: The symptoms weren't for certain. Now I know.
translation.es: Los síntomas eran confusos. Ahora lo sé.

translation.en: Fever. Withered skin.
Black bile.
Cholera.
Can't we turn back, Captain?
There's no port for a plague ship.
translation.es: Nadie recibirá a un barco con peste.

translation.en: Drop anchor at the first island.
This is all open sea.
With due respect, Captain, that small boat put off from somewheres.
translation.es: Con el debido respeto, mi capitán, ese bote vino de alguna parte.

translation.en: This is a French naval chart.
translation.es: Esta es una carta de navegación francesa.

translation.en: There's nothing but warnings.
There's reefs, atolls.
This is a cruel turn for Mrs. Hargrave.
translation.es: Es una situación difícil para la Sra. Hargrave.

translation.en: Left widowed with an infant.
Cast them adrift.
A woman alone with two children?
translation.es: ¿A una mujer sola con dos niños?

translation.en: Put a man with them.
Kearney's strong, and he's still able.
translation.es: Kearney es fuerte y aún es capaz.

translation.en: That'll give them a chance. That's more than I can say for us.
translation.es: Tendrán una oportunidad. Estarán mejor que nosotros.

translation.en: Best of a poor lot.
But keep it from the rest of the crew.
translation.es: Pero no se lo digas a los demás.

translation.en: -Wait till midwatch. -Aye, sir.
Putting us off into the peril of an open sea because some of the crew are ill?
translation.es: ¿Dejarnos a merced de los peligros del mar... ...porque algunos tripulantes están enfermos?

translation.en: -This is madness. -I'm thinking of your own good, ma'am.
translation.es: -Es una locura. -Pienso en su bien, señora.

translation.en: I may be young, but I have spent the last three years
translation.es: Quizá sea joven, pero he pasado los últimos tres años...

translation.en: In a climate of fearsome heat with insects as big as rats
translation.es: ...en un clima detestable, con insectos grandes como ratas...

translation.en: and rats as big as cats.
I can certainly deal with some deckhands down with fever.
translation.es: Sé que puedo sobrevivir a marineros con fiebre.

translation.en: We're carrying cholera.
If you stay aboard, you'll die.
translation.es: Si se quedan a bordo, morirán.

translation.en: You can't take your sea chest, missus.
translation.es: No pueden llevar el arcón, señora. Sólo lo necesario.

translation.en: Only things you really need.
But everything we have in the world would be in this chest.
translation.es: Pero todo lo que tenemos está en el arcón.

translation.en: Mrs. Hargrave will be taking her belongings.
translation.es: La Sra. Hargrave se llevará sus pertenencias.

translation.en: Aye, sir.
Cholera?
Mr. Kearney?
Mr. Kearney, a cup of water, please.
translation.es: Sr. Kearney, una taza de agua, por favor.

translation.en: There's only so much, missus.
They're in sore need, Mr. Kearney.
Look, the boy ain't yours, so he don't matter too much.
translation.es: Oiga, el niño no es suyo, así que no importa mucho.

translation.en: Your infant knows what to do.
I'd say you're fresh.
Let her suckle.
I'll tell you right now.
I'm sick and tired of them two squalling.
Then, for the love of God, give them water.
translation.es: Entonces, por el amor de Dios, deles agua.

translation.en: I'm a practical man, missus.
If I was alone, by myself, this could last a good while.
translation.es: Si estuviera solo, me duraría bastante.

translation.en: Sharing four ways makes no sense.
translation.es: Compartirla entre cuatro no tiene sentido.

translation.en: The best thing for all of us is to put them out of their misery.
translation.es: Lo mejor para todos es acabar con su sufrimiento.

translation.en: You won't touch them.
I'll do what has to be done.
Shut them up, or they're both going overboard.
translation.es: Haga que se callen o los arrojaré por la borda.

translation.en: Hush, Lilli.
That's it.
Look the other way if you don't want to see.
translation.es: Mire hacia otro lado si no quiere ver.

translation.en: Come on, Richard. Come quickly.
Jump up.
You can help Mama.
Yeah, that's my girl.
Yes.
Come on. Come on, Lilli.
Richard, you stay here.
It's fresh.
Look.
Bananas and papaws.
And roots.
Roots are good eating.
This is taro root.
We ate it at the mission.
And bananas. Come on, Richard.
Here's some bananas.
Yes, lots of bananas.
Boat.
Here, do you want some?
The boat is coming.
Boat.
Look. How pretty.
There.
We can't stay here.
We're too exposed on this side.
translation.es: Estamos demasiado expuestos de este lado.

translation.en: We've got to find a safe haven out of the weather.
Come on.
Come, Richard. Let's go for a little walk.
translation.es: Vamos, Richard. Vamos a dar un paseo.

translation.en: Here we go.
Look. How beautiful!
House.
Good heavens.
Richard?
Mama.
She's gone.
I know she's gone.
Your mama's gone.
It's all right.
It's all right. Come here, I've got you.
Mommy's gone.
I know. It's all right.
Your mama's not here, but I am.
translation.es: Tu mamá no está aquí, pero yo sí.

translation.en: I'll be your mommy from now on.
translation.es: De ahora en adelante, seré tu mami.

translation.en: Any passing ship will be able to see this when it's ablaze.
translation.es: Cualquier barco que pase lo verá cuando esté encendido.

translation.en: It won't be long before one finds us.
Go to sleep now. Close your eyes.
I'll be right back.
I know this is your favorite dessert, Richard, but eat more slowly.
translation.es: Sé que es tu postre favorito, Richard, pero come más lentamente.

translation.en: And hold the spoon this way, as I've showed you.
translation.es: Y sostén la cuchara así, como te enseñé.

translation.en: After the ship comes, you'll find yourself seated
translation.es: Cuando venga el barco, un día estarás sentado...

translation.en: at a well-appointed table in San Francisco
translation.es: ...a una mesa elegante en San Francisco...

translation.en: and be expected to show proper table manners.
translation.es: ...y se esperará que demuestres buenos modales.

translation.en: Richard, don't do that.
Just because we are away from civilization,
translation.es: Solo porque estemos lejos de la civilización...

translation.en: does not mean we will behave uncivilized.
Full moon.
They come every three months when the moon is full.
translation.es: Vienen cada tres meses durante la luna llena.

translation.en: Off to bed, children. Quickly.
Richard, come.
It'll be all right.
Tonight you will get your lullaby in the dark.
translation.es: Esta noche les cantaré su nana en la oscuridad.

translation.en: The mother.
Put it down!
Mother, why do you wear your clothes when you bathe?
translation.es: Mamá, ¿por qué te bañas con ropa?

translation.en: Because it's proper.
Why don't Richard and I wear clothes when we bathe?
translation.es: ¿Por qué Richard y yo nos bañamos sin ropa?

translation.en: I gave up on you two long ago.
translation.es: Hace tiempo me di por vencida.

translation.en: I'd put your clothes on, and you'd just take them off.
translation.es: Yo les ponía ropa y ustedes se la quitaban.

translation.en: -I wish I looked like Richard down there. -Why?
translation.es: Me gustaría ser como Richard allí abajo. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: Because he can aim when he goes...
I can hit a mango leaf dead center.
translation.es: Puedo darle a una hoja de mango justo en el centro.

translation.en: Why does he have one he can aim and we don't?
translation.es: ¿Por qué él tiene eso para hacer puntería y nosotras no?

translation.en: God, in his infinite wisdom, decided...
translation.es: Dios, en su infinita sabiduría, decidió...

translation.en: Well, nature gave us different parts.
translation.es: Bien, la naturaleza nos hizo diferentes.

translation.en: -Well, you see, a female has a-- -A cowrie shell.
What?
Lilli looks like a cowrie shell down there.
translation.es: Lilli tiene algo parecido a una concha allí abajo.

translation.en: So that's what you call mine, a cowrie shell.
translation.es: Entonces lo mío se llama concha.

translation.en: -And we call Richard's a-- -No.
Never mind. I think this has gone a little far.
translation.es: Dejémoslo así. Creo que hemos ido demasiado lejos.

translation.en: I should've explained certain of life's facts to you years ago.
translation.es: Debí haberles explicado ciertos hechos de la vida hace tiempo.

translation.en: Explain certain of life's facts now.
translation.es: Explícanos los hechos de la vida ahora.

translation.en: No, I need to think about it first.
I'll explain it to you after your spelling lesson tonight.
translation.es: Se los explicaré esta noche, después de la lección de ortografía.

translation.en: -Come on. Let's rinse. -Tonight?
Let's rinse off. All right? Everybody?
Why do people get married?
It was God's commandment that when a man and woman love each other...
translation.es: Uno de los preceptos de Dios es que... ...cuando un hombre y una mujer se aman, se comprometen.

translation.en: They take vows.
translation.es: ...cuando un hombre y una mujer se aman, se comprometen.

translation.en: Vows are like promises.
They make promises to each other
translation.es: Se hacen promesas el uno al otro...

translation.en: in the eyes of God for the whole world to witness.
translation.es: ...ante los ojos de Dios y la mirada de testigos.

translation.en: And that's called the marriage ceremony.
translation.es: Y eso se llama la ceremonia del matrimonio.

translation.en: And here is the ceremony your father used to say
translation.es: Y estas son las palabras que solía decir tu padre...

translation.en: when he performed marriages at the mission.
What about the life of facts?
translation.es: ¿Qué es la vida de los hechos?

translation.en: When a girl becomes a woman
translation.es: Cuando una niña se convierte en mujer...

translation.en: and a boy becomes a man...
When's that?
Well, it's different for everyone, but you'll know when it happens to you.
translation.es: Bueno, no es igual para todos, pero lo sabrás cuando te suceda.

translation.en: How?
Well, Lilli...
Your body will become rounder. You'll grow breasts like mine.
translation.es: ...tu cuerpo se rellenará. Tendrás pechos como los míos.

translation.en: And every month you'll bleed from the opening between your legs.
translation.es: Y cada mes sangrarás por la abertura entre tus piernas.

translation.en: I don't want to bleed.
It only lasts a few days.
And it's a great blessing, because it means you can have a baby.
translation.es: Y es una gran bendición... ...porque significa que puedes tener un bebé.

translation.en: Do I have to bleed?
But your body will change, too.
Your voice will grow deeper, and you'll grow hair on your face.
translation.es: Tu voz será más grave y te crecerá vello en la cara.

translation.en: And I think you'd look very handsome with a beard.
translation.es: Y creo que te vas a ver muy apuesto con barba.

translation.en: Unless, of course, you want to scrape it off.
translation.es: Claro, a menos que desees afeitártela.

translation.en: I want the baby now.
You can't. You're not ready yet.
translation.es: No puedes. Aún no estás lista.

translation.en: When you are, you need the man to make the baby that will grow inside you.
translation.es: Cuando lo estés, un hombre hará que el bebé crezca dentro de ti.

translation.en: Inside me?
Yes.
There's a special place inside a woman
translation.es: Hay un lugar especial en el interior de la mujer...

translation.en: where the baby stays nice and warm and safe
translation.es: ...donde el bebé permanece abrigado y seguro...

translation.en: until it's ready to be born into the world.
translation.es: ...hasta que está listo para venir al mundo.

translation.en: How does the baby get in there?
translation.es: ¿Cómo hace el bebé para entrar allí?

translation.en: After they're married,
the man and woman lie very...
translation.es: ...el hombre y la mujer se acuestan...

translation.en: Close together...
-And-- -I know.
It's like the iguanas, Lilli.
You know when they get so close you can't tell
translation.es: ¿Cuando están tan juntas que no sabes...

translation.en: where one begins and the other ends?
translation.es: ...dónde empieza una y dónde termina la otra?

translation.en: -That's it. -That's it?
Yes.
Because the iguanas always have their babies soon after.
translation.es: Porque las iguanas siempre tienen sus bebés al poco tiempo.

translation.en: That's it, Mother?
Well, that's most of it.
translation.es: Bueno, es más o menos así.

translation.en: That's what I've been waiting to hear all day?
translation.es: ¿Es eso lo que estuve esperando oír todo el día?

translation.en: That's not going to help.
Look what you did to my spear. Go away.
translation.es: Mira lo que hiciste con mi arpón. Vete.

translation.en: That was my fish.
Go back out where you belong.
Richard, look.
Now what are we gonna do?
What are we gonna do now, Richard?
-What are we gonna do? -Will you just be quiet and let me think?
translation.es: -¿Qué vamos a hacer? -¿Puedes callarte y dejarme pensar?

translation.en: We're out past sunset. Mother's gonna be so angry.
translation.es: Está anocheciendo. Mamá va a estar muy enojada.

translation.en: -What are you doing? -I've got an idea.
He's coming, come on.
Where have you been?
Do you realize how late it is?
Yes, Mother, but there was this shark, an old one
translation.es: Sí, mamá, pero había un tiburón, uno viejo...

translation.en: out in the channel. He took half of Richard's spear.
translation.es: ...en el canal. Se llevó el arpón de Richard.

translation.en: I have told you to keep away from sharks.
translation.es: Les dije que se mantuvieran alejados de los tiburones.

translation.en: -The boat drifted loose. -What are the rules, Richard?
translation.es: -El bote se soltó. -Richard, ¿cuáles son las reglas?

translation.en: -Be home by sunset always. -And?
-Never to the north side of the island. -Do you see that? A full moon.
translation.es: -No ir nunca al lado norte de la isla. -¿Ves eso? Hay luna llena.

translation.en: We are going straight home, and this is never happening again.
translation.es: Iremos directo a casa, y esto no volverá a suceder.

translation.en: Do you hear me?
Lilli. Richard. Go get some thatch.
translation.es: Lilli. Richard. Traigan hojas de palma.

translation.en: Get back inside.
"Our Father who art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name.
translation.es: "Padre Nuestro que estás en los cielos, santificado sea tu nombre.

translation.en: Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done...
translation.es: Venga a nos tu reino. Hágase tu voluntad...

translation.en: On earth as it is in heaven. Give us this day our daily bread.
translation.es: ...así en la tierra como en el cielo. Danos hoy nuestro pan de cada día.

translation.en: And forgive us our trespasses, As we forgive those who trespass against us.
translation.es: Y perdona nuestras ofensas, así como perdonamos a los que nos ofenden.

translation.en: And lead us not into temptation, But deliver us from evil.
translation.es: Y no nos dejes caer en la tentación, mas líbranos del mal.

translation.en: For thine is the kingdom, the power, and the glory, forever and ever. Amen."
translation.es: Porque tuyo es el reino, el poder y la gloria, ahora y por siempre. Amén".

translation.en: I can feel that the sickness has moved into my lungs now.
translation.es: Siento que la enfermedad ha tomado mis pulmones.

translation.en: And that means I might not get well.
translation.es: Y eso significa que quizá no me ponga bien.

translation.en: What's going to happen?
You may have to be here without me.
translation.es: Quizá deban estar aquí sin mí.

translation.en: If God wants...
translation.es: Si es la voluntad de Dios...

translation.en: I'll be with your father, and we'll be like guardian angels
translation.es: ...estaré con tu padre, y seremos como ángeles guardianes...

translation.en: watching over you.
This is my special place.
It's quiet here, and I can see the house.
translation.es: Es tranquilo y puedo ver la casa.

translation.en: Hollow out this ground...
About so deep.
And line it with thatch and moss.
translation.es: Y cúbranla con hojas de palma y musgo.

translation.en: Then fill it in...
And smooth it over with earth.
I'll write out a prayer for you to say.
translation.es: Escribiré una plegaria para que pronuncien.

translation.en: We'll carve a marker, and it will say,
"Here lies Sarah Hargrave...
Wife of William...
Mother of Lillian."
And I know I'm not your real mother, Richard
translation.es: Y sé que no soy tu verdadera madre, Richard...

translation.en: but I would like to have it say,
"and Mother of Richard."
"We pray to the Lord to grant this last abiding wish.
translation.es: "Imploramos al Señor... ...que nos conceda este último y perdurable deseo.

translation.en: That Lilli and Richard love one another, and take care of one another
translation.es: Que Lilli y Richard se amen y se protejan el uno al otro...

translation.en: and keep up with their lessons, and be prepared for the ship when it comes.
translation.es: ...y que continúen estudiando... ...y estén preparados para el barco cuando llegue.

translation.en: Amen."
-Breakfast looks extra good today. -Thank you.
translation.es: El desayuno se ve mejor que de costumbre. Gracias.

translation.en: Don't forget, it's your turn to cook tomorrow.
translation.es: No olvides que mañana te toca cocinar.

translation.en: I won't forget. You're the one who always forgets.
translation.es: No lo olvidaré. Tú eres la que siempre se olvida.

translation.en: What do I forget?
You forgot to color your eggs for the hunt.
translation.es: Olvidaste pintar los huevos para Pascua.

translation.en: I didn't forget.
I just don't think we should do it this year.
translation.es: Solo creo que no deberíamos hacerlo este año.

translation.en: But we do it every Easter.
translation.es: Pero lo hacemos todas las Pascuas.

translation.en: The marks on the calendar say tomorrow's Easter, so we must have the hunt.
translation.es: Las marcas en el calendario dicen que mañana es Pascua... ...así que debemos hacerlo.

translation.en: Why?
How else do we know who finds the most eggs and wins?
translation.es: Si no, ¿cómo sabremos quién encuentra más huevos y gana?

translation.en: Wins what, Richard?
I don't know. Nothing.
Just wins.
It seems silly to me.
I don't understand why we have to do it.
translation.es: No entiendo por qué debemos hacerlo.

translation.en: Because Mother would want us to.
I've got an idea.
Whoever finds the most eggs this year wins a prize.
translation.es: El que encuentre más huevos este año, gana un premio.

translation.en: But what kind of prize?
If you win, I've gotta give you something.
translation.es: Si tú ganas, debo darte algo.

translation.en: And if I win, you've gotta give me something.
translation.es: Y si yo gano, debes darme algo.

translation.en: It's a wonderful idea.
I hid ten eggs somewhere between the beach and the berry patch.
translation.es: Escondí diez huevos entre la playa y las moras.

translation.en: I hid ten eggs between the rocks and the fern glade.
translation.es: Escondí diez huevos entre las rocas y los helechos.

translation.en: -Ready? -Ready.
Get set. Go!
I found nine. Beat that.
translation.es: Encontré nueve. A que no me ganas.

translation.en: -I only found eight. -The winner's me!
Where's my prize?
Richard, you were down there so long. What were you doing?
translation.es: Richard, estuviste allí abajo mucho tiempo. ¿Qué estabas haciendo?

translation.en: You'll see.
Your prize.
I'm going to keep this forever.
My prize.
The white bead.
I think
it looks nice in my hair.
Do you?
I don't care what you do with it.
translation.es: No me interesa lo que hagas con ella.

translation.en: Or how you wear it.
You can hang it from your nose for all I care.
translation.es: Por mí, puedes colgártela de la nariz.

translation.en: Back and forth.
Round and round.
translation.es: A un lado y al otro.

translation.en: You think this whole reef is yours.
translation.es: Crees que todo este arrecife es tuyo.

translation.en: You think you can swallow anything that swims.
translation.es: Crees que puedes tragarte cualquier cosa que nade.

translation.en: You'd like to catch me, wouldn't you?
translation.es: Te gustaría atraparme, ¿verdad? Soy demasiado veloz para ti, estúpida tortuga.

translation.en: But I was too fast for you, stupid sea slug.
translation.es: Soy demasiado veloz para ti, estúpida tortuga.

translation.en: I can beat you every time.
And if you don't believe me, I'll prove it.
translation.es: Y si no me crees, lo probaré.

translation.en: Master of the reef!
The first time he almost got me,
translation.es: Es la primera vez que casi me atrapa...

translation.en: but I was too fast for him.
This time he was lying in wait.
So I dive in, and I can see down his mouth.
translation.es: Así que me sumergí y pude ver el interior de su boca.

translation.en: There's about 500 teeth.
There's stripy little fish around his gills.
And he comes at me...
He misses me. Stupid sea slug.
-It seems silly to me. -Silly?
It's not silly. It's dangerous.
Exactly. That's why it's silly.
I don't understand why you have to do it.
translation.es: No entiendo por qué lo haces.

translation.en: I like the way it makes me feel.
-What do you mean? -Inside here.
It feels all alive
when I know I'm master of the reef.
translation.es: ...cuando sé que soy el amo del arrecife.

translation.en: The master of the reef. The master of the reef.
translation.es: "El amo del arrecife. El amo del arrecife".

translation.en: Don't you ever make fun of me.
translation.es: Nunca vuelvas a burlarte de mí.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
Besides, you're the silly one.
Always touching yourself and looking at yourself.
translation.es: Siempre te estás tocando y mirando.

translation.en: I don't touch myself.
Yes, you do.
You're always touching those when you look in the mirror.
translation.es: Siempre te las tocas cuando te miras al espejo.

translation.en: I'm just measuring how much they've grown.
You shouldn't be looking at me when I'm naked.
translation.es: No deberías mirarme cuando estoy desnuda.

translation.en: Why not?
-I used to see you naked all the time. -Well, it's different now.
translation.es: -Solía verte desnuda todo el tiempo. -Pero ahora es diferente.

translation.en: -Why? -I don't know.
I don't know why it's different, but it is.
translation.es: No sé por qué es diferente, pero lo es.

translation.en: I just wish things could be the way they used to be
translation.es: Me gustaría que las cosas fueran como antes...

translation.en: when we had fun.
Remember the seesaw she made us?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas el subibaja que nos construyó mamá?

translation.en: The games we used to play?
Ring around the rosie?
Ring around the rosie
Pocket full of posies
translation.es: Cada cual, cada cual Que atienda a su juego

translation.en: Ashes, ashes We all fall down
translation.es: Y el que no lo atienda Pagará una prenda

translation.en: Yes?
You wouldn't mind if I moved my bed to another part of the house?
translation.es: ¿Te importaría si llevo mi cama a otro lugar de la casa?

translation.en: If you weren't gonna do it, I was.
translation.es: Si no lo hacías tú, pensaba hacerlo yo.

translation.en: How long have you been there?
I saw the blood on the quilt.
translation.es: Vi la sangre en el edredón.

translation.en: Are you all right?
Do you remember
what Mother said would happen when I became a woman?
translation.es: ...lo que mamá dijo que sucedería cuando me convirtiera en mujer?

translation.en: Yes.
Well, I've become one.
Richard, wake up.
Wake up.
I can't sleep with my bed facing the wrong way. Help me move it.
translation.es: No puedo dormir con la cama en esa posición. Ayúdame a moverla.

translation.en: -As soon as I'm awake. -You are awake.
No, I'm not.
Stop it! Let go, I'm not dressed.
Wrap the quilt around you.
Come on.
What's wrong? You're all humped over.
Just give me a minute.
What happened to it?
It gets that way all the time now.
translation.es: Ahora está todo el tiempo así.

translation.en: -Does it hurt? -No.
Can you walk?
I can walk just fine.
And I can make it go away if I want to, too.
translation.es: Y puedo hacer que vuelva a la normalidad.

translation.en: -How? -None of your business.
If we start keeping secrets, nothing will be the same.
translation.es: Si comenzamos a tener secretos, nada será como antes.

translation.en: Nothing's the same around here anyway. Nothing's the way it used to be!
translation.es: Ya nada es como antes. ¡Nada aquí es como solía ser!

translation.en: Come on, let's move your stupid bed.
Mother.
I don't know what to do.
He's changed, I've changed.
translation.es: Él ha cambiado, yo he cambiado.

translation.en: Everything's so confusing.
I'm tired of you always snooping on me. Go away.
translation.es: Estoy harta de que me espíes todo el tiempo. Vete.

translation.en: I'm sick of you always telling me to go away.
translation.es: Estoy harto de que siempre me eches.

translation.en: Go away, Richard. I mean it.
Fine. I'm going where I've always wanted to. To the north side of the island.
translation.es: Bien. Me iré adonde siempre quise. Al lado norte de la isla.

translation.en: No, you can't do that. You know we're in a full moon.
translation.es: No, no puedes hacer eso. Sabes que hay luna llena.

translation.en: -I can do whatever I want to do. -No, you can't. It's a rule.
translation.es: -Puedo hacer lo que quiera. -No, no puedes. Es una regla.

translation.en: It's not my rule, it was her rule. She wasn't even my real mother anyway.
translation.es: No es mi regla, era la regla de ella. Ni siquiera era mi verdadera madre.

translation.en: She loved you like she was your real mother.
translation.es: Te amaba como si fuera tu verdadera madre.

translation.en: I don't care.
I'm sick of her rules, and I'm sick of your rules.
translation.es: Estoy harto de sus reglas y de las tuyas.

translation.en: From now on, I can do whatever I want to do.
translation.es: De ahora en adelante, puedo hacer lo que quiera.

translation.en: I'm old enough. I can go wherever I want to go, and come home when I want to.
translation.es: Ya soy mayor. Puedo irme y regresar a casa cuando quiera.

translation.en: What happened? What have you done?
I had to hide.
There were all these heathens, and they danced around me.
translation.es: Un montón de paganos bailaban a mi alrededor.

translation.en: They didn't see me. If they had, I'd have been dead.
translation.es: No me vieron. Si lo hubieran hecho, estaría muerto.

translation.en: And there was this one heathen, and at first I wanted to kill him.
translation.es: Había un pagano y al principio quise matarlo.

translation.en: And then I didn't want to kill him.
And then I couldn't kill him.
Then he saw you. He'll tell the others.
translation.es: Entonces te vio. Les dirá a los demás.

translation.en: No. I let him go. Peace.
translation.es: No. Lo dejé ir. En paz.

translation.en: I hope you're right. Richard, I'm so glad you're not hurt.
translation.es: Espero que tengas razón. Richard, estoy tan feliz de que estés bien.

translation.en: I thought I'd never see you again. I never want us to fight again.
translation.es: Pensé que no te vería nunca más. No quiero que volvamos a pelear.

translation.en: Ever.
Me either.
-Lilli? -Yes?
-Friends? -Oh, yes. Always.
I feel like crying.
So do I.
-I want us to be husband and wife. -Yes.
With this ring, I thee wed.
translation.es: Con este anillo, te tomo por esposa.

translation.en: With this ring, I thee wed, Richard.
translation.es: Con este anillo, te tomo por esposo, Richard.

translation.en: Amen.
-And now we're-- -One...
Forever.
Look.
Lilli, hurry.
The signal fire!
Richard, what if they're heathens? I'm frightened.
translation.es: Richard, ¿y si la ven los paganos? Tengo miedo.

translation.en: Maybe we shouldn't light the signal fire.
translation.es: Quizá no debamos encender la fogata.

translation.en: Let's see who they are first.
There's eight people.
The one in the light covering may be a woman.
translation.es: La de ropa clara podría ser una mujer.

translation.en: Woman?
Keep them in your sight.
They may not be civilized.
Civilized. C-i-v-i-l-i-z-e-d.
Remember what Mother said about a good, firm handshake.
translation.es: Recuerda lo que dijo mamá acerca de un buen apretón de manos.

translation.en: My name is Richard.
We've been waiting for you for a long time.
translation.es: Hace mucho tiempo que los estamos esperando.

translation.en: I'm Lilli, and I'm ready for you to take us back to civilization.
translation.es: Soy Lilli, y estoy lista para que nos lleve de regreso a la civilización.

translation.en: What?
I am Capt. Jacob Hilliard, master of the Trade Wind.
translation.es: Soy el capitán Jacob Hilliard, a cargo del Tradewind.

translation.en: And we... Is this your land?
Yes. My house is there.
Well, we're in need of fresh water. Our casks are fouled.
translation.es: Bien, necesitamos agua dulce. Nuestros barriles se arruinaron.

translation.en: Will you grant us permission to come ashore?
Yes.
You are welcome here.
If you don't mind covering yourself, I'll get my daughter.
translation.es: Si no le molesta cubrirse, traeré a mi hija.

translation.en: Does that binding around your neck choke you?
translation.es: ¿Esa cinta alrededor de su cuello no lo asfixia?

translation.en: No, certainly not.
Well, yes, sometimes.
I'd appreciate it if you'd...
How do you catch fish with that spear?
It's not a spear, mate.
-What is it? -It's a rifle.
Blow a man's head right off his shoulders.
translation.es: Puede arrancarle la cabeza a un hombre.

translation.en: Castaways. How exciting.
They seem to be an odd mixture of knowledge and ignorance.
translation.es: Parecen una combinación extraña de sabiduría e ignorancia.

translation.en: Their attire is a little bit...
Well, it's quite sparse.
Is anything wrong?
The color, it's the same as the sky.
translation.es: El color, es igual al cielo.

translation.en: Pure silk.
With my compliments.
And one for your brother.
Oh, he's not my brother. He's my husband.
translation.es: No es mi hermano. Es mi esposo.

translation.en: Your husband?
Mother died six years ago.
-How do you follow the years? -She taught us.
We count the moons. We know that twelve full moons are one year.
translation.es: Contamos las lunas. Sabemos que doce lunas llenas son un año.

translation.en: We have Christmas and Thanksgiving and Easter.
translation.es: Celebramos Navidad, Acción de Gracias y Pascua.

translation.en: Although we're not exactly sure we celebrate them on the right days.
translation.es: Aunque no estamos seguros si las celebramos los días correctos.

translation.en: It's utterly amazing, the two of you all these years...
translation.es: Es absolutamente increíble, los dos todos estos años...

translation.en: In this remote godforsaken place.
translation.es: ...en este lugar remoto dejado de la mano de Dios.

translation.en: Not godforsaken, Capt. Hilliard.
translation.es: No dejado de la mano de Dios, capitán Hilliard.

translation.en: Not godforsaken at all.
translation.es: Para nada dejado de la mano de Dios.

translation.en: You do set an excellent table.
My compliments to the chef.
Look, Sylvia. They've fashioned their own dinnerware.
translation.es: Mira, Sylvia. Fabricaron sus propios utensilios.

translation.en: Cups, soup spoons. Ingenious.
Won't Mr. Quinlan be joining us?
Mr. Quinlan is a seafarer and prefers to be by himself.
translation.es: El Sr. Quinlan es un marino y prefiere la soledad.

translation.en: It's plain to see why you've been lost for so long.
translation.es: Está claro por qué han permanecido aquí tanto tiempo.

translation.en: The charts don't even show this island.
translation.es: La isla no figura en la carta de navegación.

translation.en: It's a wonder we found you.
translation.es: Es asombroso que los hayamos encontrado.

translation.en: Heathens come to the north side of the island, at certain times.
translation.es: Los paganos vienen a la parte norte de la isla en ciertas épocas.

translation.en: There's a burial ground there.
This is ever so tasty.
A great treat from the slop we have to eat on the ship.
translation.es: Es un festín comparado con la bazofia que comemos en el barco.

translation.en: What is it?
Eel broth.
Eel?
Well, only the broth is eel.
translation.es: Bueno, solo el caldo es de anguila.

translation.en: The little white chunks are sea urchin.
translation.es: Los trocitos blancos son erizo de mar.

translation.en: We appreciate your hospitality and hope
that you'll offer us the opportunity to repay you.
You can.
You can take us with you, back to civilization.
I should think...
It must be awfully boring here.
What is the meaning of "boring"?
Well, boring is when you have nothing whatever to do.
translation.es: Bueno, aburrido es cuando no hay nada para hacer.

translation.en: So you're bored.
Like you must be here.
No. We're never bored.
Boots, and a shirt, and cotton trousers.
translation.es: Botas, una camisa y pantalones de algodón.

translation.en: I'll let Sylvia explain the female garments.
translation.es: Dejaré que Sylvia describa las prendas femeninas.

translation.en: Well, carry on.
Buttons.
I remember buttons on Mother's dress.
translation.es: Recuerdo los botones en el vestido de mamá.

translation.en: It's Irish lace.
Richard, you'll have to turn your head. I'm going to show Lillian a foundation garment.
translation.es: Richard, no mires. Voy a mostrarle a Lillian la ropa interior.

translation.en: Although, I dare say, there isn't much you haven't seen.
translation.es: Aunque, yo diría, que ya has visto prácticamente todo.

translation.en: -What does it do? -It goes around the waist, like this.
translation.es: -¿Para qué sirve? -Se coloca en la cintura, así.

translation.en: And then cinch the drawstring.
translation.es: Y luego se ajusta el cordón.

translation.en: Don't look yet, Richard. I'm showing Lillian my secrets.
translation.es: No mires aún, Richard. Le estoy mostrando a Lillian mis secretos.

translation.en: Look. This is velvet plush.
And these are silver.
It's so smooth.
Hairbrush and comb. Powder puff.
And rouge, and powder.
Lavender water.
Musk-rose perfume.
And a hand mirror.
You're very pretty.
Except for the hue of your skin, but we can fix that.
translation.es: Excepto por el tono de tu piel, pero podemos arreglar eso.

translation.en: What's wrong with my skin?
The sun has tainted it all brown.
We'll have to lighten it with lemon juice.
translation.es: Debemos aclararla con jugo de limón.

translation.en: Why?
Well, you don't want people in San Francisco
translation.es: Bueno, no querrás que en San Francisco...

translation.en: to think you're a field hand, do you?
translation.es: ...la gente piense que eres una campesina.

translation.en: That's worse than fish fat.
It's quite costly.
Well, look at you.
You do look handsome in your boulevard suit.
translation.es: Te ves apuesto en tu traje de calle.

translation.en: So handsome.
Do you think I've applied too much rouge, Richard?
translation.es: ¿Crees que me puse demasiado colorete, Richard?

translation.en: No. I think it's beautiful.
translation.es: No. Creo que te ves hermosa.

translation.en: Well, thank you, kind sir.
Now I'm all powder and paint with nothing to do, as usual.
translation.es: Estoy empolvada y pintada y sin nada que hacer, como siempre.

translation.en: We could go outside and count stars.
translation.es: Podríamos ir afuera y contar estrellas.

translation.en: Is that what you do here at night? Count stars?
translation.es: ¿Es eso lo que hacen de noche? ¿Cuentan estrellas?

translation.en: Sometimes we count stars.
Sometimes I play my whistle, and we sing.
translation.es: A veces toco mi silbato y cantamos.

translation.en: Sometimes we mate. Sometimes we sleep.
translation.es: A veces nos apareamos. A veces dormimos.

translation.en: Mate?
-Yes. -Do you mate often?
Whenever we want to.
Just like that?
Yes.
Sometimes we dance. I love to dance.
translation.es: A veces bailamos. Me encanta bailar.

translation.en: Come on, Richard. Let's show Sylvia how we dance.
translation.es: Vamos, Richard. Mostrémosle a Sylvia cómo bailamos.

translation.en: Come on, Sylvia. You try it.
I don't call that a dance. It's childish and simple-minded.
translation.es: Eso no es un baile. Es infantil e ingenuo.

translation.en: What do you mean?
Grown people don't dance like that.
Maybe we should learn a grown-up dance for San Francisco?
translation.es: ¿Quizá deberíamos aprender un baile de adultos para San Francisco?

translation.en: -I shall teach you. -Will you?
It's like this.
It's a bit naughty. It's called the Spanish polka.
translation.es: Es algo pícaro. Se llama polca española.

translation.en: Now do it slow.
One, two, three. One, two, three. One, two, three.
translation.es: Uno, dos, tres. Uno, dos, tres.

translation.en: You're a beautiful dancer, Richard. One, two, three.
translation.es: Eres un gran bailarín, Richard. Uno, dos, tres.

translation.en: Lillian's going to have to brush up on her manners.
translation.es: Lillian tendrá que repasar sus modales.

translation.en: It's not polite to leave your guest in the middle of a lesson.
translation.es: No es cortés dejar al invitado en la mitad de la clase.

translation.en: Sorry, but she'll just have to wait her turn.
translation.es: Lo siento, pero deberá esperar su turno.

translation.en: One, two, three. One, two, three.
translation.es: Uno, dos, tres. Uno, dos, tres.

translation.en: She's gonna teach me how to mazurka.
translation.es: Me enseñará a bailar la mazurca.

translation.en: As soon as I get it right, I'll show you.
You lied to me.
When did I lie to you?
You told me once that you'd never hurt me.
translation.es: Una vez me dijiste que nunca me lastimarías.

translation.en: How did I hurt you?
When you always stare at her, it hurts me.
translation.es: Cuando la miras a ella, me lastimas.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
It's just that she's so different.
In what way?
Just look at her.
The way she's all covered up.
translation.es: La forma en que está cubierta.

translation.en: But you said you found all those clothes stupid and unnecessary.
translation.es: Pero dijiste que toda esa ropa te parecía estúpida e innecesaria.

translation.en: I do.
It's just... I wonder what she looks like underneath all of them.
translation.es: Es que... Me pregunto cómo se verá debajo de todo eso.

translation.en: You mean, you want to look at her, because you can't see her?
translation.es: ¿O sea que la miras porque no la puedes ver?

translation.en: Yes.
You remember when I wanted to go to the north side of the island
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas cuando quería ir al lado norte de la isla...

translation.en: just because I couldn't?
Yes, I do.
And I also remember what almost happened to you when you did go.
translation.es: Y también recuerdo lo que estuvo a punto de sucederte cuando fuiste.

translation.en: Good night, Richard.
-What have you done to yourself? -Don't you like it?
No. Wash it off.
You don't like it on me, but you love it on Sylvia.
translation.es: En mí no te gusta, pero en Sylvia te encanta.

translation.en: Please, Lilli, let's not fight.
-We promised we'd never fight. -No.
You never eat breakfast anymore. Are you sick?
translation.es: Ya no comes el desayuno. ¿Estás enferma?

translation.en: Richard, I'm ready for my lesson now.
translation.es: Richard, ya estoy lista para mi lección.

translation.en: I promised to teach her how to fish.
translation.es: Le prometí que le enseñaría a pescar.

translation.en: Here we are together.
Out here in the middle of a beautiful fishpond.
translation.es: En el medio de una hermosa laguna llena de peces.

translation.en: In plain view of everyone.
So respectable.
But look at this, kind sir.
All we have to do is lower our heads...
translation.es: Todo lo que tenemos que hacer es bajar las cabezas...

translation.en: And we're completely hidden from prying eyes.
translation.es: ...y quedamos ocultos de las miradas curiosas.

translation.en: So we can do whatever we want.
translation.es: Para poder hacer lo que queramos.

translation.en: Lovely.
Get out of here!
Come on, don't be like that.
He'll never hear you. He'll be out playing games with Miss Sylvia for hours.
translation.es: No te oirá. Estará divirtiéndose... ...con la Srta. Sylvia durante un buen rato.

translation.en: But you're missing something.
-Where's your lovely pearl? -I don't know what you mean.
translation.es: -¿Dónde está tu hermosa perla? -No sé de qué me habla.

translation.en: The white bead that you wear in your hair. Where is it?
translation.es: La cuenta que llevas en el cabello.

translation.en: At the house.
It's no time to be thinking about Lilli.
translation.es: No es momento de pensar en Lilli.

translation.en: I told her I'd never hurt her.
translation.es: Le dije que nunca la lastimaría.

translation.en: Don't feel sorry for her, Richard. She's had you all to herself.
translation.es: No sientas pena por ella, Richard. Te tuvo todo el tiempo.

translation.en: But she doesn't own you. You're not married.
translation.es: Pero no le perteneces. No estás casado.

translation.en: We are.
But not really.
A lot of made up words in the middle of a jungle doesn't count.
translation.es: Un montón de palabras inventadas en el medio de la jungla no cuenta.

translation.en: It does to me.
Why don't you just follow your heart.
She is my heart.
Where is it?
You can't just leave me here.
Very rude behavior.
You'll never fit in civilized society.
translation.es: Nunca pertenecerás a la sociedad civilizada.

translation.en: Get away from her.
-That came from the house. -Get the other rifle, quickly.
translation.es: -Vino de la casa. -Trae el otro rifle, deprisa.

translation.en: Give me that rifle, quick.
Get him.
Look out!
Help us!
Quinlan, you'll kill him.
All right, Quinlan, that's enough.
translation.es: Está bien, Quinlan, ya es suficiente.

translation.en: You heard me, I said enough.
translation.es: Me escuchaste, dije que ya es suficiente.

translation.en: Break it up.
Keep out of it, Giddens. I'll take his bloody head off.
translation.es: Aléjate, Giddens. Le arrancaré la maldita cabeza.

translation.en: -Get off him. -Take orders.
Put that down.
Bugger off.
You heard the Captain. Drop that, or you'll answer to mutiny.
translation.es: Ya oíste al capitán. Suelta el arma o te juzgarán por amotinamiento.

translation.en: -Quinlan, put it down. -Look out, Richard!
Run!
Are you all right?
I'm fine.
I always weather a storm well.
-I get that from Mother. -Yes, you do.
Capt. Hilliard says he wants to set sail at dawn.
translation.es: El capitán Hilliard dice que quiere partir al amanecer.

translation.en: I guess that means Capt. Hilliard's daughter wants to set sail at dawn.
translation.es: Supongo que eso significa que su hija desea partir al amanecer.

translation.en: I don't care what she wants.
I don't care about her at all. I know that now, Lilli.
translation.es: Ella no me interesa en absoluto. Ahora lo sé, Lilli.

translation.en: Don't you understand, you're the most important thing to me.
translation.es: No comprendes, eres lo más importante para mí.

translation.en: You can set sail at dawn.
But we're not going.
You're not making sense.
translation.es: Lo que dices no tiene sentido.

translation.en: Do you remember...
That lullaby she used to sing to us?
translation.es: ...la nana que nos solía cantar mamá?

translation.en: Yes.
Will you teach me to play it on this?
Why?
I'm going to have use for it.
There's a baby growing inside of me.
translation.es: Hay un bebé creciendo dentro de mí.

translation.en: How do you know?
A woman knows these kind of things, that's how.
translation.es: Una mujer sabe este tipo de cosas.

translation.en: And I won't let it be born in civilization.
translation.es: Y no permitiré que nazca en la civilización.

translation.en: I want it to be born right here.
Where there's no evil, and no lies, and no guns.
translation.es: Donde no hay maldad ni mentiras ni armas.

translation.en: You're right.
We'll stay here.
Just the three of us.
I love you, Lilli.
